title: no longer available as a 48 card lot
author: tonyo

posts.post_title: no longer available as a 48 card lot
posts.post_content: These are currently down to 42 cards left.  Shown in a different thread and listing on ebay periodically.
Other than a kind offer from Gnaz (Thanks Greg!),  didn't get any help with trade offers,  so I'll put these up for sale for a while.
updated with new price for smaller lot.
